summary: The 'Stop Anarchists From Endangering Cities Act' (SAFE Cities Act) directs the Attorney General to identify and publish a list of "anarchist jurisdictions" – states or local governments deemed to have failed to take reasonable steps to stop violence and property destruction.  The bill outlines criteria for identifying such jurisdictions, including policies restricting law enforcement intervention, disempowering/defunding police, or refusing federal assistance.  It also mandates the Director of the Office of Management and Budget to issue guidance to federal agencies on restricting grant eligibility for these jurisdictions.
